div.p: This value set expansion contains 4 concepts.

td.a: One typhoid dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed-93

tr.td: One typhoid dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed

div.p: "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Typhoid vaccines")

td.a: The primary series has been completed-93

tr.td: The primary series has been completed

div.p: "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Typhoid vaccines")

td.a: Typhoid booster dose was administered less than 3 years ago-225

tr.td: Typhoid booster dose was administered less than 3 years ago

div.p: Count of vaccines administered (where "Vaccine type" = "Typhoid vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Booster dose") ≥ 1 AND Today's date - Latest "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type" = "Typhoid vaccines") < 3 years

description.value: ValueSet IMMZD18STyphoidViPS for IMMZ.D18.S.Typhoid.ViPS schedule. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a typhoid vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: Unconjugated Vi polysaccharide (ViPS), 1 dose schedule
